sentences.sContent: She started to sit up, grimaced, and sank back weakly against the pillow.
sentences.sCn: 她开始坐起来，痛苦地皱着脸，又虚弱地靠回到枕头上。

remMethod.val: grim(可怕的) + ace(看作face) → 可怕的脸 → 鬼脸

trans.tranOther: an expression you make by twisting your face because you do not like something or because you are feeling pain
